Tom Leppart to ask for a city review of how council members hand out ceremonial gifts. "We don't condone it and clearly didn't approve it," Leppert said of the Michael Vick award. It's unfortunate, and I would rather have not seen the situation. The key Dwaine Caraway gave Michael Vick was less than official, city officials explained. The official Dallas "keys" are made from gold or crystal and given out mostly to foreign dignitaries under strict protocol.
